title: New Randers metrics defined by the other Randers metrics
authors: Azar Fatahi, Masoumeh Hosseini and Hamid Reza Salimi Moghaddam
abstract:
In this short article, using a left-invariant Randers metric $F$, we define a
new left-invariant Randers metric $\tilde{F}$. We show that $F$ is of Berwald
(Douglas) type if and only if $\tilde{F}$ is of Berwald (Douglas) type. In the
case of Berwaldian metrics, we give the relation between their flag curvatures.
Also, we have studied the relations between their base Riemannian metrics.
Finally, as examples, the results are studied in the Heisenberg group and
almost Abelian Lie groups.
